answers.author: Maxwell Moline
answers.text:
Hans,
Your user name is the email address that you used to set up your profile. If you've lost your password, you can have a new one emailed to you on that same email address.
I hope that answers your question, if not, call me at (202) 962-3613 and I can help you further.

author: Hans Lindvall
text: Where can I find my user name?
title: User name
